sn47.6:4.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi.
sn47.6:4.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lāpo sakuṇo sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṃ paridevasi:
sn47.6:4.3: ‘mayamevamha alakkhikā, mayaṃ appapuññā, ye mayaṃ agocare carimha paravisaye.
sn47.6:4.4: Sacejja mayaṃ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye, na myāyaṃ, sakuṇagghi, alaṃ abhavissa, yadidaṃ—
sn47.6:4.6: ‘Ko pana te, lāpa, gocaro sako pettiko visayo’ti?
sn47.6:4.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṃvadamānā lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ pamuñci:
sn47.6:4.10: ‘gaccha kho tvaṃ, lāpa, tatrapi me gantvā na mokkhasī’ti.
sn47.6:5.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lāpo sakuṇo naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇaṃ leḍḍuṭṭhānaṃ gantvā mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvā sakuṇagghiṃ vadamāno aṭṭhāsi:
sn47.6:5.2: ‘ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghī’ti.
sn47.6:5.3: Atha kho sā, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṃvadamānā ubho pakkhe sannayha lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā.
sn47.6:5.4: Yadā kho, bhikkhave, aññāsi lāpo sakuṇo ‘bahuāgato kho myāyaṃ sakuṇagghī’ti, atha tasseva leḍḍussa antaraṃ paccupādi.
sn47.6:5.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi tattheva uraṃ paccatāḷesi.
sn47.6:5.6: Evañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47.6:6.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47.6:6.2: Agocare, bhikkhave, carataṃ paravisaye lacchati māro otāraṃ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ.
sn47.6:6.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47.6:6.7: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, sotaviññeyyā saddā … pe …
sn47.6:6.10: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā—
sn47.6:7.1: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47.6:7.2: Gocare, bhikkhave, carataṃ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṃ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ*.
sn47.6:7.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47.6:7.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn47.6:7.10: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ—
sn47.6:7.11: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
